transArray.content: The room facilities are complete. Fruits and drinks are provided upon check-in. The front desk service is very friendly and the breakfast is very rich. The hotel's prevention and control measures are in place during the recent epidemic. Parking is free. I am very satisfied.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. Travel routes can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is equipped with complete facilities, electric curtains, refrigerated small refrigerator, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only when you live well and eat well can you feel at home. Sincerely looking forward to your next visit! General Manager: Li Changxia
